course_description: This course focuses on expansion of clinical assessment and reasoning skills. Family Nurse Practitioner (FNP) students will address¿increasingly complex health problems common to the adult and pediatric populations with¿emphasis on primary care management across the lifespan.
prerequisites: NRSG 550D or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
